# Twilight Haze (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Shadow Spells|shadow]]) \[[[Darkness Spells|darkness]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 197

You create a gray haze that obscures sight (as *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]*) and causes the illumination level within it to drop one step (as *[[Darkness (Spell)|darkness]]*). Since this spell produces an illusion rather than a true physical fog, it is unaffected by wind and can be cast underwater.
